data.eml:eml: A new species of Socarnes Boeck, 1871 (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Lysianassidae) from Korean waters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kim, Young-Hyo, Hendrycks, Ed A. (2013): A new species of Socarnes Boeck, 1871 (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Lysianassidae) from Korean waters. ZooKeys 357: 1-10, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.357.6372, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.357.6372
